entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
